targets.query: SELECT mean("temp_input") FROM "compunaut_one_year"."sensors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "chip" =~ /^$chip$/ AND "feature" = 'core_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("temp_input") FROM "compunaut_one_year"."sensors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "chip" =~ /^$chip$/ AND "feature" = 'core_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("temp_input") FROM "compunaut_one_year"."sensors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "chip" =~ /^$chip$/ AND "feature" = 'core_0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sensors" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ipmi_sensor WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "name" =~ /fan.+rpm/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ipmi_sensor WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "name" =~ /^current/
